Treatment of dysgerminoma may include the following:         - Total abdominal hysterectomy and bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, with removal of as much of the cancer in the pelvis and abdomen as possible.    -  Unilateral salpingo-oophorectomy followed by chemotherapy.
